text.value: You cannot select none if you have selected a danger sign!
Is currently experiencing any of these danger signs?
Abdominal distension and not passing stools
Crying continuously after all effort failed
Skin rash all over the body
Swelling, redness or pus discharges on the umbilical cord
You cannot select none if you have selected a danger sign!
Is currently experiencing any of these danger signs?
You cannot select none if you have selected a danger sign!
Is currently experiencing any of these danger signs?
Person to visit health facility alone
Did you refer to the health facility?
Abdominal distension and not passing stools
Crying continuously after all effort failed
Follow up task will appear on
Tasks will appear when follow up is needed.
_Accompany to the health facility immediately for danger signs management._
Refer to health facility
_Be sure you submit to complete this action._
Skin rash all over the body
Swelling, redness or pus discharges on the umbilical cord
Kupweteka kwa mutu, chizungulire kapenga nkhungu mmaso
Chongani chizindikiro china chiri chonse chomwe chiri chofunika
Simungasankhe palibe ngati mwasankha kale chizindikilo china chowopysa!
Kodi woyembekezera akuwona zizindikiro zowopsya izi
Kupweteka kwa m'mimba ndi kukanika kuchita chimbuzi

_Pelekezani ku chipatala kuti akalandire chithandizo china._
_Wonetsetsani kuti mwatumiza tsambali kuti mumalize ntchito iyi._
Kutupa, kufiira kapena kutuluka mafinya pa mchombo

bind.calculate: if((count-selected( /danger_signs_screening/danger_sign_screening/anc_danger_signs ) > 0 and not(selected( /danger_signs_screening/danger_sign_screening/anc_danger_signs , 'none'))) or (count-selected( /danger_signs_screening/danger_sign_screening/pnc_danger_signs ) > 0 and not(selected( /danger_signs_screening/danger_sign_screening/pnc_danger_signs , 'none'))) or (count-selected( /danger_signs_screening/danger_sign_screening/baby_danger_signs ) > 0 and not(selected( /danger_signs_screening/danger_sign_screening/baby_danger_signs , 'none'))), 'yes', 'no')
